data.name: YUME : Special Edition - adult patch
data.detailed_description:
This is a casual puzzle game, players can light up the light bulb in the game to complete the level
In the level, players need to light all the bulbs at the same time in order to successfully pass the level.
The game contains a total of ten levels
3D discover the model and use different dances and emotes.
Undress the model after reaching certain levels.
Exciting rewarding moments with the sexy girls.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Gef750
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, Adult content only.
All characters involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.
